content.rendered:
The investment world is crowded

Merchant Banking

Alvarium Merchant Banking is a global corporate advisory practice providing independent services to companies across the media, consumer and technology sectors, and all sectors impacted by digital disruption. As a boutique firm we can offer our clients a bespoke service, including M&A advisory, private placement and strategic advice. Our extensive experience combined with our focused approach and global network has seen us provide significant value for our clients over the past 20 years.

Completed Transactions
01
Scroll Down
Services

Services

The Merchant Banking team offers independent services to individuals, funds and corporates across many areas, including:

  • M&A Advisory Services
  • Private Placements & Joint Ventures
  • Fund Placements
  • Direct Co-Investments
  • Public Company IPO Advisory Services
  • Strategic Advisory Services
  • Independent Board Advice
  • Structured Finance Advisory Services
  • Fairness Opinions & Valuations
  • Sector Research & Market Insight

Network

Our network is truly global and built on 20 years of experience in this space. The team has a significant international presence and our continuous direct dialogue with entrepreneurs, CEOs and investors around the world means that we’re able to stay at the forefront of trends and activity in the innovation economy.

Over time, we’ve been able to establish strong and long-lasting relationships with our partners that give us access to proprietary opportunities and capital on a worldwide basis.

Next Generation
Global Leaders

Alvarium Merchant Banking has formed the Next Generation Global Leaders (NGGL) initiative to provide a programme of events, webinars, insights and investment opportunities for the next generation of founders, entrepreneurs and investors.

Read about our first NextGen Summer event at Soho Farmhouse here

Our programme focuses on three key sectors which we believe are, and will continue to be, at the forefront of thinking for Next Gens today, and which encourage a deeper understanding of our themes:

  • Positive Impact
  • The Innovation Economy
  • Digital Disruption

NextGen@alvariuminvestments.com

‘This generation wants to be more exposed and more involved . . . A flexible, more skilful and light-footed merchant bank for all the generations will emerge’.

Ken Costa, Co-Chairman
